com.shop.cache.api.client.io
Interface SCClientContext

public interface SCClientContext

Builder interface for containing client data. NOTE: it is not necessary to set every value. Implementations should provide reasonable defaults (except for the client address)

Method Summary
 SCClientContext address(java.net.InetSocketAddress address)
          Set the address of the client
 java.net.InetSocketAddress getAddress()
          Returns the currently set address
 SCNotifications getNotificationHandler()
          Returns the current notification handler
 SCClientContext notificationHandler(SCNotifications n)
          Set a notification object
